availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Wood (Logan County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Anna McCutchen Wood in Logan County on November 30, 1841. Father of Elizabeth Wood, Mary B. Wood, Susan Wood, Sally Wood, Mariah Wood, Olive Wood, Anna Wood, Johnnie Wood, Georgia Wood, Charlie Wood. Farmer in Logan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, District 1, p. 466
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, Auburn, p. 328A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Logan County Marriages, Film #000364550.
